lyrics:
5 contributorsno one knows lyricsverse 1
we get some rules to follow
that and these and these and those
no one knows
we get these pills to swallow
how they stick in stick in your throat
tastes like gold
oh what you do to me
no one knows

chorus
and i realize youre mine realize that youre mine
indeed a fool just a fool of mine youre just a fool youre just a fool of mine
and i realize that youre mine realize youre mine
indeed indeed just a fool a fool of mine yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah

verse 2
i journey through the desert
of the mind and with no hope
i follow
i drift along the ocean
dead lifeboats caught in the sun
and come undone
pleasantly caving in
i come undone
you might also likechorus
and i realize that you are mine realize that youre mine
indeed indeed youre just a fool just a fool of mine youre just a fool youre just a fool of mine
and i realize that you are mine realize youre mine
indeed indeed youre just a fool youre such a fool of mine yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah

bridge
youre just a fool of mine
but no one knows
no one knows
no one knows
no one knows
no no one knows

outro
heaven smiles above me
what a gift can be low
but no one knows
a gift that you give to me to me
no one knowsembed
